name: Bitsadmin Download File with Suspicious Extension
description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file with a suspicious extension
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\.[Aa][Ss][Aa][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Hh][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Mm][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Aa][Ss][Pp][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Ff][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Gg][Ii].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Hh][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Ee][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Ss][Pp][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss][Mm]1.*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Ss][Cc][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Aa][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Ww][Ss][Hh].*/ OR /.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp].*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/transfer\ * OR *\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:(*.asax* OR *.ashx* OR *.asmx* OR *.asp* OR *.aspx* OR *.bat* OR *.cfm* OR *.cgi* OR *.chm* OR *.cmd* OR *.gif* OR *.jpeg* OR *.jpg* OR *.jsp* OR *.jspx* OR *.png* OR *.ps1* OR *.psm1* OR *.scf* OR *.sct* OR *.txt* OR *.vbe* OR *.vbs* OR *.war* OR *.wsf* OR *.wsh* OR *.zip* OR *.rar* OR *.dll*))`
